collection.name: Funeral of the Dead Butterflies
collection.openText: 소중한 친구들을 두고 올 수 없어서 슬펐던 아이는 기막힌 생각을 해냈지!

observe.desc: [ {We are feathers of a wing. Feathers fall off when they are no longer useful. - Then where did they go? They are bound to the company even after they are discarded. - A long ago, people believed that they become beautiful beings with small wings when they die. Nonsense. If we have wings, can we leave here? Do we get wings only after we are discarded?} ]

[ {The burdened crier came here to redeem all. But now he is trapped like everyone else, lingering with dying hopes. He carries a coffin for those who have nowhere else to go. It’s too small for them though. Inside it are butterflies waiting for eternal rest. Lots of butterflies and no flowers. They just wait for the end of this world.} ]
